Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(web\): resolve correct database user ID from Discord OAuth metadata

The Supabase Auth UUID \(auth.uid\(\)\) differs from the users table UUID
used in work order foreign keys. This caused user identity mismatches
when checking ownership or performing actions. Now both client-side
\(detail page\) and server-side \(action helpers\) resolve the users table
ID by looking up the Discord user ID stored in auth metadata.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
